grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 詳報【ショウホウ】detailed report, full report, details, particulars
詳細【ショウサイ】details, particulars, specifics, detailed, specific, minute, close-up view (of a digitally displayed map), zoomed-in view
不詳【フショウ】unknown, unidentified, unspecified
姓名不詳【セイメイフショウ】unidentified, name unknown
kun reading compounds: 詳しい【くわしい】detailed, full, accurate, knowing very well, well-acquainted, well-informed
詳しい話【くわしいはなし】full story, detailed account
詳らか【つまびらか】detailed, clear
詳らかでない【つまびらかでない】unknown
